      • CalExist

        public static boolean CalExist()
        Returns:
        If the file exists it returns true, if not returns false.

      • CalInit

        public static boolean CalInit()
        Returns:
        None

      • remove

        public static void remove(java.lang.String event,
          int date,
          boolean removeAll)

        Removes the given event at the given date, or removes all instances of the given event from the Calendar

        Parameters:
        event - - String: Event in the form of "starttime endtime event"
        date - - Int: Date at which the event will be removed (presuming single is selected)
        removeAll - - Boolean: True if all events removed, false if single event removed

      • CalRead

        public static java.lang.String CalRead(int date)
        Returns:
        String that holds the event written at the date inputed.

      • getEvents

        public static java.lang.String getEvents(int date)

        Gets the events from the given date and returns them as one string.

        Parameters:
        date - - Int: Indicates the date from which events are pulled.
        Returns:
        String of all events on given date

      • CalReadV2

        public static java.lang.String[] CalReadV2(int date,
                           boolean box)

        Reads in all events on a given date from file, returns them as an array of strings

        Parameters:
        date: - Int: Date at which the events will be read in
        box - - Boolean: Indicates whether the function should return just the events themselves or an array in which the events are marked if they conflict.
        Returns:
        Array of Events (box - true: just the events, false: Events are marked if conflicting)

      • updateIntArr

        public static int[] updateIntArr(int newInt,
                 int[] oldArr)

        Updates an array of integers by adding in newInt, mimicing dynamic arrays

        Parameters:
        newInt - - Int: New int to be added to array
        oldArr - - Int[]: Array for newInt to be added to
        Returns:
        Array of Integers with newInt added to it

      • updateStringArr

        public static java.lang.String[] updateStringArr(java.lang.String x,
                                 java.lang.String[] oldArr)

        Updates an array of strings by adding in x, mimicing dynamic arrays

        Parameters:
        x - - String: new String to be added to array
        oldArr - - String[]: array of strings which x will be added to
        Returns:
        Array of Strings with x added to it

      • getNextDay

        public static int getNextDay(int date)

        Returns the next day after the given date

        Parameters:
        date - Int: Date which the next day will be calculated from (in the form YYYYMMDD)
        Returns:
        int that is the next day after the given date (in the form YYYYMMDD)

      • checkConflicts

        public static java.lang.String[] checkConflicts(int[] startTimes,
                                int[] endTimes,
                                java.lang.String[] events)
        Parameters:
        startTimes - - int[] the array of start times for events that occur in the same day
        endTimes - - int[] the array of end times for events that occur in the same day
        events - - String[] the array of 'events' (example: 9 8 workout *conflict*) that occur in the same day
        Returns:
        String[] - events
